I haven't downloaded it yet, but it sounds like you have the problem.  I suggest you look at your AC3 settings before you post.

I have problems viewing Episode 5 and 6, even with the latest VLC player installed. Picture is behind, lots of pixels, and then jumps ahead to where the narrator is. Running OSX 10.5.6 and the latest VLS 0.9.9a.

Anyone any suggestions on how to fix it and play it correctly?
Habichtshorst.. if u are using VLC n the timing is out use (K) key or the (H) key 2 adjust the ratio of video 2 audio and u can make the delay rite.....
